ПАРНИ, игра погибает, близард не справляется, электроники признали свое поражение,что они не смогли спасть комьюнити, они пытались, пытались оптимизировать это каловое выделение, но у них не получилось, от лица епик геймс-игре осталось около недели. все ваши скины пропадут, игра не окупилась и мы ее закрываем.

Getting better with active updates these days - especially with Operation Shattered Web. The biggest pain  point (even on Prime accounts) however is the number of cheaters using wall hacks, aim bots, trigger bots, fake latency, tick hacks to evade shots, etc. Very frustrating to see Valve doesn't care enough to protect the experience, probably because the cheaters also bring them money. Unless they introduce another layer of Trust Factor with an intrusive anti-cheat client like BattleEye, this situation is not going to change. But I digress. Besides the cheaters aspect of the game, in the last year CSGO has introduced several updates. Valve is telling players that they are not leaving the game behind to catch dust and die. The community is responding with increasing number of players each month. Speaking of the community, it could be a mixed bag. But when you find good people you frequently end up playing with, even Casual mode can be immensely rewarding.
